official_name: Reliance Foundation Undergraduate and Postgraduate Scholarship
target_group: Meritorious Students in Technical and Scientific Fields
introduction: Reliance Foundation Scholarship is one of India's most prestigious corporate scholarships, offering comprehensive financial support to meritorious students from economically weaker sections. The scholarship supports undergraduate and postgraduate students pursuing studies in Engineering, Technology, Energy, and Life Sciences.

basic_requirements: Must be a resident Indian citizen
Enrolled in first year of full-time undergraduate degree
Studying Engineering, Technology, Energy, or Life Sciences

academic_requirements.aptitude_test: Must answer the mandatory Aptitude Test conducted by Reliance Foundation

basic_requirements: Must be a resident Indian citizen
Enrolled in first year of full-time regular postgraduate degree
Studying Engineering, Technology, Energy, or Life Sciences

undergraduate.duration: Over the duration of the degree programme

postgraduate.duration: Over the duration of the degree programme

application_process.mode: Online Application through Reliance Foundation Portal
steps: Visit Reliance Foundation Scholarship official website
Register with email and create account
Login and fill detailed application form
For UG: Complete the mandatory Aptitude Test
For PG: Submit academic transcripts and SOP

selection_process: Initial screening based on eligibility criteria
Final selection by Reliance Foundation Scholarship Committee
Offer letter issued to selected scholars
Annual renewal based on academic performance
unique_features: One of the highest scholarship amounts in India for private scholarships
Covers entire duration of degree programme
Comprehensive support including tuition, books, and living expenses
Networking events and workshops for scholars
important_notes: Family income limit is ₹15 Lakh - higher than most scholarships
UG applicants MUST take and pass the mandatory Aptitude Test
PG applicants need minimum 7.5 CGPA in undergraduate studies
Renewable annually based on satisfactory academic progress
UG scholarship: Up to ₹2,00,000 over 4 years
PG scholarship: Up to ₹6,00,000 over 2 years
Statement of Purpose (SOP) is crucial for selection
Only for Engineering, Technology, Energy, and Life Sciences

faq.question: What is the Aptitude Test for UG applicants?
faq.answer: The Aptitude Test assesses logical reasoning, analytical skills, and subject knowledge. It is mandatory for all undergraduate applicants and conducted online during the application process.

faq.question: Is the scholarship renewable?
faq.answer: Yes, the scholarship is renewable every year based on satisfactory academic performance and continued enrollment in the program.

faq.question: Can I apply if my family income is exactly ₹15 Lakh?
faq.answer: The income limit is ₹15 Lakh per annum. Income slightly above this threshold may not be eligible.

faq.question: What courses are covered under Life Sciences?
faq.answer: Life Sciences include Biotechnology, Biochemistry, Microbiology, Genetics, Bioinformatics, and related fields.

faq.question: Do I need to attend an interview?
faq.answer: Yes, shortlisted candidates are typically invited for a personal interview as part of the final selection process.
